    public class UserOptionsSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AdapterManager ADmanager
      reference to ADmanager created in ListView
      private android.app.AlertDialog alertDialogGiveLeadership
      dialog that shown as last step before giving someone leadership - to ask user verify that its the wanted action
      private android.widget.Button btnSendMail 
      private android.app.AlertDialog.Builder chooseLeaderActionBuilder
      show dialog of actions that leader(me) in group can do when long-clicking other group users
      private android.app.AlertDialog.Builder chooseParticipantActionBuilder
      show dialog of actions that participant in group can do when long-clicking other group users
      static android.app.Dialog createCustomMailDialog
      show dialog to create custom mail to send to someone - with title, body
      private android.widget.EditText edtBodySendMail 
      private android.widget.EditText edtTitleSendMail
      this EditText is passed to FirebaseMailSystem because in some mails(for example reply mails) we want the title to remain the same - so we have to update it in fms
      private FirebaseHelper FBhelper
      reference to FBhelper created in ListView
      static boolean isReplyMail 
      static GroupUser longClickSelected
      the last selected mail from the mail-box.
      private android.app.AlertDialog.Builder sendGroupEmailActionBuilder
      show dialog of actions that leader(me) in group can do when long-clicking himself(send email to all group users)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserOptionsSystem(android.app.Activity activity, FirebaseHelper FBhelper, AdapterManager ADmanager)
      A long constructor that initializes all the variables, including the dialogs, what to do when positive/neutral/negative button clicked etc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(android.view.View v)
      handles click on btnSendMail.
      void requestJoinGroup()
      When user click on 'Request' button(btnJoinLeaveGroup in uiHelper) we want to send mail to the group leader that I want to join the group, without ability to change title; shows 'createCustomMailDialog' but not allows to change title(edtTitleSendMail.setEnabled(false)
      void showLeaderGroupMailDialog()
      Im leader of the group and long-clicked on myself, show me dialog of what can i do(send mail to all group participants at once)
      void showLeaderOptionsDialog(GroupUser gu)
      im the group leader that long-clicked on one of the participants, show me a dialog that says what can i do(kick, send mail, promote to leader)
      void showParticipantOptionsDialog(GroupUser gu)
      im a simple group participant that long-clicked on one of other participants, show me a dialog that says what can i do(only send mail)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • longClickSelected

        public static GroupUser longClickSelected
        the last selected mail from the mail-box. sometimes even when some mail selected this variable will be null to indicate some action(for example that the mail we send is to all the users)

      • isReplyMail

        public static boolean isReplyMail

      • btnSendMail

        private final android.widget.Button btnSendMail

        private android.widget.EditText edtTitleSendMail
        this EditText is passed to FirebaseMailSystem because in some mails(for example reply mails) we want the title to remain the same - so we have to update it in fms

    • Method Detail

      • requestJoinGroup

        public void requestJoinGroup()
        When user click on 'Request' button(btnJoinLeaveGroup in uiHelper) we want to send mail to the group leader that I want to join the group, without ability to change title; shows 'createCustomMailDialog' but not allows to change title(edtTitleSendMail.setEnabled(false)

      • showLeaderOptionsDialog

        public void showLeaderOptionsDialog(GroupUser gu)
        im the group leader that long-clicked on one of the participants, show me a dialog that says what can i do(kick, send mail, promote to leader)
        Parameters:
        gu - the groupUser that I long-clicked on(from MapsActivity)

      • showParticipantOptionsDialog

        public void showParticipantOptionsDialog(GroupUser gu)
        im a simple group participant that long-clicked on one of other participants, show me a dialog that says what can i do(only send mail)
        Parameters:
        gu - the groupUser that I long-clicked on(from MapsActivity)

      • showLeaderGroupMailDialog

        public void showLeaderGroupMailDialog()
        Im leader of the group and long-clicked on myself, show me dialog of what can i do(send mail to all group participants at once)

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        handles click on btnSendMail. Initializes the mail with data got from the sendMailDialog and passes it to FBhelper.fgs.fms to send it to firebase and the user
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:
        v - the clicked view
